title: Rihanna’s Savage x Fenty fashion show: Amazon Prime Video releases teaser
text:
A teaser has been released for the stream of Rihanna’s Savage X Fenty fashion show on Amazon Prime Video.

Rihanna put on her second annual Savage X Fenty show in Brooklyn during New York Fashion Week.

The show featured a variety of stars on the runway, including model Cara Delevingne, Orange Is The New Black star Laverne Cox and rapper 21 Savage.

While photos from the event were released on the day, footage of the entire performance, including behind-the-scenes clips, will be released online on Friday.

Rihanna teased the forthcoming “visual event” with a 36-second clip, released on Instagram and YouTube by Amazon Prime Video.

The teaser provides a glimpse into the chaotic backstage atmosphere at the Savage X Fenty show, showing models walking around frantically and dancing as they gear up for the performance.

At the beginning of the clip, Rihanna stands backstage with her hands on her hips, turning to the camera as she states: “I’m ready.”

Later on, Delevingne can be seen walking at a rapid pace off-stage while carrying a green, heart-shaped wand, an expression of shock visible on her face.

Several of Rihanna’s Instagram followers reacted in excitement to the Savage X Fenty show teaser trailer.

“I’m calling out of work just to watch this and putting my phone on DO NOT F***ING DISTURB,” one person commented.

“I’ve never been this excited since the release of Anti in 2016,” another said, in reference to the singer’s eighth studio album.

The Savage X Fenty Show will stream exclusively on Amazon Prime Video in more than 200 countries and territories across the world.
